de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler

Interface TncsContentHandlerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTncsContentHandlerFactory

    public interface TncsContentHandlerFactory
    Generic TNCS content handler factory to create a TNCS content handler.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TncsContentHandler createHandler(ImvHandler imHandler, TncsHandler tncsHandler, TnccsValidationExceptionHandler exceptionHandler)
      Creates a TNCS content handler with the given TNCS message handler, IMV message handler and validation exception handler.

    • Method Detail

      • createHandler

        TncsContentHandler createHandler(ImvHandler imHandler,
                               TncsHandler tncsHandler,
                               TnccsValidationExceptionHandler exceptionHandler)
        Creates a TNCS content handler with the given TNCS message handler, IMV message handler and validation exception handler.
        Parameters:
        imHandler - the IMV message handler
        tncsHandler - the TNCS message handler
        exceptionHandler - the validation exception handler
        Returns:
        a TNCS content handler
